meaningMnemonic: This <kanji>measurement</kanji> also refers to a specific measurement, a "<vocabulary>sun</vocabulary>", which is about <vocabulary>3.03 centimeters</vocabulary>. You'll hear it brought up from time to time to measure things, though usually with more traditional Japanese items.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the kanji! Congrats! Now to remember it's three point zero three centimeters.
